item.description:
We will gather around 3:00 for sociallizing and to check out what the Course has to say about this time of year with some novel ways of viewing Christmas. We'll probably eat around 4:00 or so.

This will be a good time for newer and older members to get to know one another better. Feel free to join us whether or not you have already attended a regular study group session. You'll find that we are a very welcoming fun loving group.

Let me know what you plan on bringing. Keep it simple. If possible, bring something vegetarian. Please e-mail by responding to this message or sending a note to my e-mail, tcoving@gmail.com.

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: Holiday Potluck!!
